page.title: 13SHELTERED HOUSING
page.content: In Huntly there are 5 sets of Sheltered Housing.One of these is Callum court in McVeagh St.It has 2 floors of flats. They were built by Andersons the builder in 1981/82.The official opening was in April 1982. This Housing is built to give old people a better life and to keep them out of old peoples homes.The residents have there own flats filled with there own furniture.An alarm service is fitted in each flat which will call a warden who will help them.A wardens job is to ensure the residents are well.When on duty the warden is on 24 hour call.In Callum Court there are males and female.Each person is assessed before being taken in.The age range at Callum Court is from 70 years to 92 years.
